patterns.title: Singleton
patterns.description: Ensure a class only has one instance, and provide a global point of access to it.

patterns.title: Adapter
patterns.description: Convert the interface of a class into another interface clients expect. Adapter lets classes work together that couldn't otherwise because of incompatible interfaces.

patterns.title: Template Method
patterns.description: Define the skeleton of an algorithm in an operation, deferring some steps to subÂ­classes. Template Method lets subclasses redefine certain steps of an algorithm without changing the algorithm's structure.
